Feb 25 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - TOWER SALES UPDATE

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - ENTERED INTO MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING AGREEMENTS FOR POTENTIAL SALE OF ITS TOWER ASSETS IN CHAD AND GABON, TO HELIOS TOWERS PLC

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - GABON: AIRTEL AFRICA AND HELIOS TOWERS HAVE EXTENDED THEIR MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING ARRANGEMENT

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - COMPLETION STILL SUBJECT TO HELIOS TOWERS OBTAINING A PASSIVE INFRASTRUCTURE LICENCE

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
